description:
Citra is a great emulator for Nintendo 3DS, open source, the interface is simple, yet functional and configurable.
The games run smooth on most PC nowadays, even on my laptop which I caught my surprised by the fine optimization they put into this project.
Very good job.
summary: Citra already supports most Nintendo 3DS games

description: It is pretty much the emulator you need to emulate 3ds games on your pc. You can Even get 4k out of it if your machine supports that kind of performance.Love it.
Lo he estado probando un poco, es mi emulador favorito para 3DS, la emulacion es casi estable en mi i3, en pokemon XY aun no hay musica de fondo,pero si estan los efectos de sonido.
summary: En pokemon XY aun no hay musica de fondo
